content: I am trying to install Lean4 on my Mac. I ran the command in the terminal, but I don't know if it was successful. I went ahead and tried to "install" the Mathematics in Lean book. When I type either source ~/.profile or source ~/.bash_profile I get the following message: no such file or directory: /Users/jaclynlang/.profile. I did install Mathematics in Lean and I have a folder called mathematics_in_lean. But when I run the command lake exe cache get, I get the message: zsh: command not found: lake. Can someone help me figure out what is going on? Thank you!
What happens if you try to follow these instructions?
Thanks for the suggestion. It seems things are working now. I'll ask again if something goes wrong.
